comments.body:
`grep -E` should be equivalent and POSIX. `egrep` is deprecated.
https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/SC2196

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@  # resilient to the other fields changing (we hope)
  "${KUBE_ROOT}/cluster/kubectl.sh" version --client | sed "s/, */\\
/g" | grep -E "^GitVersion:" | cut -f2 -d: | cut -f2 -d\"
}
